channel.title: Big Gay RPG Meme
channel.description:
üåà Welcome to Pride Month! I bestow upon you all a curs√©d meme! Please join me for #BigGayRPG! üí´ (On this thread, Twitter, Facebook, and wherever memes are memed.)
#BigGayRPG by @oh_theogony
Do you create or play tabletop, video, or live action roleplaying games? Regardless of your exact sexuality, do you ever say about yourself: I‚ÄôM GAY? This meme is for you! Tweet 1 answer each day in June.
1. What‚Äôs the most kissable type of monster? 2. Gayest weapon and why? 3. Describe the 1st time you saw gay content in a game. 4. A famous IRL gay you‚Äôd like to meet in a fictional world? 5. Gayest RPG setting? 6. How to make the average D&D tavern more gay? 7. A loudly gay RPG designer we should follow? 8. Favorite officially gay RPG character? 9. Most annoyingly gay-coded-but-officially-straight character? 10. How have RPGs helped you understand your identity? 11. What‚Äôs it like being gay in RPGs where you live? 12. Name a challenge of this straight-dominated hobby. 13. One way to support other gay RPG people? 14. If you‚Äôre trans and/or nonbinary, what‚Äôs the best representation you‚Äôve seen in a game? If not, just answer ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt know.‚Äù 15. Gayest armor and why? 16. Would you rather play a gay hero or a gay villain? 17. How do you feel about romance in games? 18. How do you feel about sex in games? 19. How do you feel about violence in games? 20. How do you feel about rock ‚Äôn‚Äô roll in games? 21. How do you feel about homophobia in fantasy worlds? 22. What do gay adventurers do during downtime? 23. Name 1 thing that would make you feel more comfortable being gay in the RPG scene. 24. What is your character‚Äôs gay anthem? 25. How do you feel about coming-out narratives in games? 26. Does your age affect your relationship to gay RPG content? 27. Tell us about an indie TTRPG that is super gay. 28. Tell us about an indie LARP/freeform that is super gay. 29. Tell us about an indie video game that is super gay. 30. Gayest magic spell?

item.title: Big Gay RPG Meme
item.dc:creator: @oh_theogony
item.description:
@oh_theogony wrote:

Welcome to Pride Month! I bestow upon you all a curs√©d meme! Please join me for #BigGayRPG! (On this thread, Twitter, Facebook, and wherever memes are memed.)

#BigGayRPG by @oh_theogony

Do you create or play tabletop, video, or live action roleplaying games?
Regardless of your exact sexuality, do you ever say about yourself: I‚ÄôM GAY?
This meme is for you! Tweet 1 answer each day in June.

  1. What‚Äôs the most kissable type of monster?
  2. Gayest weapon and why?
  3. Describe the 1st time you saw gay content in a game.
  4. A famous IRL gay you‚Äôd like to meet in a fictional world?
  5. Gayest RPG setting?
  6. How to make the average D&D tavern more gay?
  7. A loudly gay RPG designer we should follow?
  8. Favorite officially gay RPG character?
  9. Most annoyingly gay-coded-but-officially-straight character?
  10. How have RPGs helped you understand your identity?
  11. What‚Äôs it like being gay in RPGs where you live?
  12. Name a challenge of this straight-dominated hobby.
  13. One way to support other gay RPG people?
  14. If you‚Äôre trans and/or nonbinary, what‚Äôs the best representation you‚Äôve seen in a game? If not, just answer ‚ÄúI don‚Äôt know.‚Äù
  15. Gayest armor and why?
  16. Would you rather play a gay hero or a gay villain?
  17. How do you feel about romance in games?
  18. How do you feel about sex in games?
  19. How do you feel about violence in games?
  20. How do you feel about rock ‚Äôn‚Äô roll in games?
  21. How do you feel about homophobia in fantasy worlds?
  22. What do gay adventurers do during downtime?
  23. Name 1 thing that would make you feel more comfortable being gay in the RPG scene.
  24. What is your character‚Äôs gay anthem?
  25. How do you feel about coming-out narratives in games?
  26. Does your age affect your relationship to gay RPG content?
  27. Tell us about an indie TTRPG that is super gay.
  28. Tell us about an indie LARP/freeform that is super gay.
  29. Tell us about an indie video game that is super gay.
  30. Gayest magic spell?
